# This CMakeLists.txt is auto-generated

option(0301 "arrays" ON)
if(0301)
    add_executable(0301_test 0301_test.cpp)
    target_include_directories(0301_test PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/exercise/03_containers)
    target_link_libraries(0301_test GTest::gtest_main)
    include(GoogleTest)
    gtest_discover_tests(0301_test)
endif()
